sn16.11:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahakassapo rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn16.11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anando dakkhinagirismim carikam carati mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim.
sn16.11:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasmato anandassa timsamatta saddhiviharino bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatta bhavanti yebhuyyena kumarabhuta.
sn16.11:2.2: Atha kho ayasma anando dakkhinagirismim yathabhirantam carikam caritva yena rajagaham veluvanam kalandakanivapo yenayasma mahakassapo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakassapam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam ayasma mahakassapo etadavoca:
sn16.11:2.3: “kati nu kho, avuso ananda, atthavase paticca bhagavata kulesu tikabhojanam pannattan”ti?
sn16.11:3.1: “Tayo kho, bhante kassapa, atthavase paticca bhagavata kulesu tikabhojanam pannattam—
sn16.11:3.2: dummankunam puggalanam niggahaya pesalanam bhikkhunam phasuviharaya, ma papiccha pakkham nissaya sangham bhindeyyum, kulanuddayataya ca.
sn16.11:3.3: Ime kho, bhante kassapa, tayo atthavase paticca bhagavata kulesu tikabhojanam pannattan”ti.
sn16.11:4.1: “Atha kincarahi tvam, avuso ananda, imehi navehi bhikkhuhi indriyesu aguttadvarehi bhojane amattannuhi jagariyam ananuyuttehi saddhim carikam carasi?
sn16.11:4.2: Sassaghatam manne carasi, kulupaghatam manne carasi.
sn16.11:4.3: Olujjati kho te, avuso ananda, parisa;
sn16.11:5.1: “Api me, bhante kassapa, sirasmim palitani jatani.
sn16.11:5.2: Atha ca pana mayam ajjapi ayasmato mahakassapassa kumarakavada na muccama”ti.
sn16.11:5.3: “Tatha hi pana tvam, avuso ananda, imehi navehi bhikkhuhi indriyesu aguttadvarehi bhojane amattannuhi jagariyam ananuyuttehi saddhim carikam carasi, sassaghatam manne carasi, kulupaghatam manne carasi.
sn16.11:5.4: Olujjati kho te, avuso ananda, parisa;
sn16.11:6.2: “ayyena kira mahakassapena ayyo anando vedehamuni kumarakavadena apasadito”ti.
sn16.11:7.1: Atha kho thullananda bhikkhuni anattamana anattamanavacam niccharesi:
sn16.11:7.2: “kim pana ayyo mahakassapo annatitthiyapubbo samano ayyam anandam vedehamunim kumarakavadena apasadetabbam mannati”ti.
sn16.11:7.3: Assosi kho ayasma mahakassapo thullanandaya bhikkhuniya imam vacam bhasamanaya.
sn16.11:8.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn16.11:8.2: “tagghavuso ananda, thullanandaya bhikkhuniya sahasa appatisankha vaca bhasita.
sn16.11:8.3: Yatvaham, avuso, kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajito, nabhijanami annam sattharam uddisita, annatra tena bhagavata arahata sammasambuddhena.
sn16.11:8.4: Pubbe me, avuso, agarikabhutassa sato etadahosi:
sn16.11:8.6: Nayidam sukaram agaram ajjhavasata ekantaparipunnam ekantaparisuddham sankhalikhitam brahmacariyam caritum.
sn16.11:8.7: Yannunaham kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyan’ti.
sn16.11:8.8: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena patapilotikanam sanghatim karetva ye loke arahanto te uddissa kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajim.
sn16.11:9.1: So evam pabbajito samano addhanamaggappatipanno addasam bhagavantam antara ca rajagaham antara ca nalandam bahuputte cetiye nisinnam.
sn16.11:9.7: So khvaham, avuso, tattheva bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavocam:
sn16.11:9.10: Evam vutte, mam, avuso, bhagava etadavoca:
sn16.11:9.11: ‘yo kho, kassapa, evam sabbacetasa samannagatam savakam ajananneva vadeyya janamiti, apassanneva vadeyya passamiti, muddhapi tassa vipateyya.
sn16.11:9.12: Aham kho pana, kassapa, jananneva vadami janamiti, passanneva vadami passamiti.
sn16.11:10.2: “tibbam me hirottappam paccupatthitam bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesu”ti.
sn16.11:11.2: “yam kinci dhammam sunissami kusalupasamhitam sabbam tam atthim katva manasi karitva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasoto dhammam sunissami”ti.
sn16.11:13.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava imina ovadena ovaditva utthayasana pakkami.
sn16.11:13.2: Sattahameva khvaham, avuso, sarano ratthapindam bhunjim atthamiya anna udapadi.
sn16.11:14.1: Atha kho, avuso, bhagava magga okkamma yena annataram rukkhamulam tenupasankami.
sn16.11:14.2: Atha khvaham, avuso, patapilotikanam sanghatim catuggunam pannapetva bhagavantam etadavocam:
sn16.11:14.3: ‘idha, bhante, bhagava nisidatu, yam mamassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya’ti.
sn16.11:14.4: Nisidi kho, avuso, bhagava pannatte asane.
sn16.11:14.5: Nisajja kho mam, avuso, bhagava etadavoca:
sn16.11:14.7: ‘Patigganhatu me, bhante, bhagava patapilotikanam sanghatim anukampam upadaya’ti.
sn16.11:14.8: ‘Dharessasi pana me tvam, kassapa, sanani pamsukulani nibbasanani’ti.
sn16.11:14.10: So khvaham, avuso, patapilotikanam sanghatim bhagavato padasim.
sn16.11:14.11: Aham pana bhagavato sanani pamsukulani nibbasanani patipajjim.
sn16.11:15.1: Yanhi tam, avuso, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn16.11:15.2: ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadayado, patiggahitani sanani pamsukulani nibbasanani’ti, mamam tam samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn16.11:15.3: ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadayado, patiggahitani sanani pamsukulani nibbasanani’ti.
sn16.11:16.1: Aham kho, avuso, yavade akankhami vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn16.11:16.3: (navannam anupubbaviharasamapattinam pancannanca abhinnanam evam vittharo veditabbo.)
sn16.11:17.1: Aham kho, avuso, asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharami;
sn16.11:17.2: sattaratanam va, avuso, nagam addhatthamaratanam va talapattikaya chadetabbam manneyya, yo me cha abhinna chadetabbam manneyya”ti.
sn16.11:18.1: Cavittha ca pana thullananda bhikkhuni brahmacariyamhati.
